caption: Counter loop pattern Iterating over an implicit sequence of numbers
exif: {"Image DocumentName": "Counter loop pattern Iterating over an implicit sequence of numbers", "Image ImageDescription": "Introduction to Computing Using Python. Iterating over an implicit sequence of numbers. >>> n = 10. >>> for i in range(n): print(i, end= ) >>> for i in range(7, 100, 17): print(i, end= ) This example illustrates the most important application of the counter loop pattern. >>> for i in range(len( world )): print(i, end= )", "Image XResolution": "37", "Image YResolution": "37", "Image ResolutionUnit": "Pixels/Centimeter", "Image Software": "SlidePlayer", "Image YCbCrPositioning": "Centered"}
